sub_title: Petrophysicist/Geophysicist |Oil & Gas |Data Analysis & Integration |Technical Writing |Interdisciplinary Collaboration
summary: Worked on the acquisition planning, analysis, quality control and integration of a wide spectrum of geological, geophysical and petrophysical data. Received direct mentorship from industry experts at the Colorado School of Mines and Aramco, and developed skills in interdisciplinary communication, technical writing and project management.
